scripts.main-test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NEW_RELIC_ENABLED=false nyc --silent --temp-directory=./.nyc_output mocha ./test/test.js -t 60000 -R spec --exit
scripts.monitoring-test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NEW_RELIC_ENABLED=true nyc --no-clean --silent --temp-directory=./.nyc_output mocha ./test/test-datastore-instrumentation.js -t 60000 -R spec --exit
scripts.test: retval=0 npm run main-test || retval=$?; npm run monitoring-test || retval=$?; npm run report || retval=$?; npm run lint || retval=$?; exit $retval
